The doctor suggested 'Streptococcal Pharyngitis (Strep Throat)', which is a type of bacterial pharyngitis.
The doctor suggested 'Mononucleosis (Mono)', which is the same as 'Infectious mononucleosis'.
The suggested differential diagnoses do not include any conditions related to allergic rhinitis or post-nasal drip.
The suggested differential diagnoses do not include 'Acute tonsillitis', which is a specific condition that can be related to the symptoms of pharyngitis but was not mentioned by the doctor.
